DataElement.preferredName: Dentist Third Molar Referral Recommendation Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the type as related to advice for sending patient for the removal of any one of the rearmost molars on each side of the upper and lower jaw in humans.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to advice for sending patient for the removal of any one of the rearmost molars on each side of the upper and lower jaw in humans.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An individual licensed for the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of diseases in the oral cavity, adjacent tissues, and related structures.

Concepts.definition: An individual licensed for the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of diseases in the oral cavity, adjacent tissues, and related structures.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any one of the rearmost molars on each side of the upper and lower jaw in humans.:Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services.:Recommendation; advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

Concepts.definition: Any one of the rearmost molars on each side of the upper and lower jaw in humans.
Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services.
Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

PermissibleValues.value: I recommend removal of third molars only if a patient presents with symptoms or pathology associated with third molars
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I recommend removal of third molars only if a patient presents with symptoms or pathology associated with third molars

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I recommend removal of third molars only if a patient presents with symptoms or pathology associated with third molars
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: I recommend removal of third molars only if a patient presents with symptoms or pathology associated with third molars

PermissibleValues.value: I recommend removal of third molars if they are asymptomatic but have a poor eruption path (e.g., full/partial impaction), or do not appear to have sufficient space for eruption
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I recommend removal of third molars if they are asymptomatic but have a poor eruption path (e.g., full/partial impaction), or do not appear to have sufficient space for eruption

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I recommend removal of third molars if they are asymptomatic but have a poor eruption path (e.g., full/partial impaction), or do not appear to have sufficient space for eruption
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: I recommend removal of third molars if they are asymptomatic but have a poor eruption path (e.g., full/partial impaction), or do not appear to have sufficient space for eruption

PermissibleValues.value: I recommend removal of most third molars for preventive reasons
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I recommend removal of most third molars for preventive reasons

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: I recommend removal of most third molars for preventive reasons
